excerpt: 1. New substack loading!! Today we’re 4 weeks out from my next book and I’m launching my substack to celebrate! A sneak peek recipe too! 2. I must must must make this lemon pie. Best I’ve ever seen. 3. Might be the best thing one of my kids has ever said. Jordan told me there […]
text: 1. New substack loading!! Today we’re 4 weeks out from my next book and I’m launching my substack to celebrate! A sneak peek recipe too! 2. I must must must make this lemon pie. Best I’ve ever seen. 3. Might be the best thing one of my kids has ever said. Jordan told me there was a bug on his “upside down wall.” The ceiling!! Now I can’t stop calling it the upside down wall. 4. What do you want more of in life? 5. I still can’t get enough of this iced cherry chai. I think I need to give it up for lent. 6. I’m in major spring clean mode! Here are the best spring cleaning tips. 7. TV things! White Lotus… what! Also 1923 telling us where the train station started! 8. Things to never keep on your kitchen island. I can’t stand when there is anything on my island – I wish I could use it for decor but I prefer it completely clean!
html:
1. New substack loading!! Today we’re 4 weeks out from my next book and I’m launching my substack to celebrate! A sneak peek recipe too!

2. I must must must make this lemon pie. Best I’ve ever seen.

3. Might be the best thing one of my kids has ever said. Jordan told me there was a bug on his “upside down wall.” The ceiling!! Now I can’t stop calling it the upside down wall.

4. What do you want more of in life?

5. I still can’t get enough of this iced cherry chai. I think I need to give it up for lent.

6. I’m in major spring clean mode! Here are the best spring cleaning tips.

7. TV things! White Lotus… what! Also 1923 telling us where the train station started!

8. Things to never keep on your kitchen island. I can’t stand when there is anything on my island – I wish I could use it for decor but I prefer it completely clean!
